########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

include_directories(${Boost_INCLUDE_DIR})
link_directories(${Boost_LIBRARY_DIRS})

if(ENABLE_GPUFFT)
	list(APPEND electrosense_sources
	    rpi_gpufft_impl.cc
	    discard_samples_impl.cc
	)
else()
	list(APPEND electrosense_sources
	    discard_samples_impl.cc
	)
endif(ENABLE_GPUFFT)

set(electrosense_sources "${electrosense_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT electrosense_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT electrosense_sources)


add_library(gnuradio-electrosense SHARED ${electrosense_sources})
if(ENABLE_GPUFFT)
	target_link_libraries(gnuradio-electrosense gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime gpufft)
	target_include_directories(gnuradio-electrosense
   	 PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
  	  PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
 	 )
	
else()
	target_link_libraries(gnuradio-electrosense gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime)
	target_include_directories(gnuradio-electrosense
   	 PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
   	 PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
  	)
endif(ENABLE_GPUFFT)
set_target_properties(gnuradio-electrosense PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_electrosense_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-electrosense PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-electrosense)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
